title: Keep Your Bike Clean
description: Wash your bike regularly to prevent dust and rust buildup. A clean bike not only looks great but also runs smoother.

title: Lubricate the Chain
description: Apply chain lube every few hundred kilometers to ensure a smooth and silent ride. Avoid over-lubrication.

title: Change Engine Oil Regularly
description: Engine oil keeps your bikeâ€™s engine healthy. Change it as per manufacturer recommendations to ensure better performance.

title: Check Tire Pressure
description: Maintain proper tire pressure for safety and better mileage. Underinflated tires reduce control and increase wear.

title: Inspect Brakes Frequently
description: Your brakes are your lifeline. Inspect pads and fluid regularly for safety and efficient stopping power.

title: Cover When Not in Use
description: Use a quality bike cover to protect your ride from dust, rain, and UV damage. Keeps your bike looking new for years.
